aspnetcore.rate_limiting.result.description: Rate-limiting result, shows whether the lease was acquired or contains a rejection reason

aspnetcore.routing.is_fallback.description: A value that indicates whether the matched route is a fallback route.

aspnetcore.diagnostics.handler.type.description: Full type name of the [`IExceptionHandler`](https://learn.microsoft.com/dotnet/api/microsoft.aspnetcore.diagnostics.iexceptionhandler) implementation that handled the exception.

aspnetcore.request.is_unhandled.description: Flag indicating if request was handled by the application pipeline.

aspnetcore.diagnostics.exception.result.description: ASP.NET Core exception middleware handling result
